CustomField.description: Google API Chart Sent Vs. Responded
CustomField.formula: IMAGE("http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?cht=p3&chd=t:" & Text(Sent__c/(Sent__c+ Responded__c)) & "," & Text(Responded__c/(Sent__c+ Responded__c)) & "&chs=275x100&chf=bg,s,F3F3EC&chl=Sent|Responded&chco=5555ff", "Sent vs. Responded Chart")
CustomField.label: Responded Rate
